hadiths.text: It was narrated from ‘Abdullah bin ‘Umar that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“Every intoxicant is unlawful and whatever causes intoxication in large amounts, a small amount of it is (also) unlawful.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا أَسْكَرَ كَثِيرُهُ فَقَلِيلُهُ حَرَامٌ
chapter.eng-name: What causes intoxication in large amounts, a small amount of it is (also) unlawful
